comments:
Round floating point axial hex coordinates to integer *(q,r)* coordinates.

This code was adapted from:

https://www.redblobgames.com/grids/hexagons/#rounding
##### Args
* **q (array[float]) **: NumPy array of Floating point axial *q* coordinates to round

* **r (array[float]) **: NumPy array of Floating point axial *q* coordinates to round

##### Returns
